::Slaughter::

     Slaughter ran to get out, but was stopped by the giant transformer
monster that was Menasor.

     "RAAH!!!!" Slaughter yelled.

     Slaughter tried to run away from Menasor.  Obviously, his mind power
hadn't worked on Motormaster, or it was just the other Stunticons making
Menasor attack him.
